setData.questLineName: To the Daring Go the Spoils
setData.questStepSummary: Xûr wishes to tell you more of the Starhorse's desires.

displayProperties.description: Look for another Stasis-sealed chest in Bray Exoscience.
displayProperties.name: Europa Legs

2471210438.displaySource: "Eramis has long laid claim to the spoils left behind on Europa from the Golden Age. But she has betrayed us all and must not be allowed to keep any of it. Find what she has hidden, and use Stasis to acquire it. For the cause." —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description: Return to Variks.
displayProperties.name: Europa Legs

2471210439.displaySource: "Europa is rich in spoils of the past. Bring your findings back to me." —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description: Look for Stasis-sealed chests in Bray Exoscience and Eternity.
displayProperties.name: Europa Arms

3560528864.displaySource: "Eramis was wise to hide away technology she uncovered on Europa. Her failure, however, is intertwined with underestimation of you. Find what she has hidden, and use Stasis to acquire it. For the cause." —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description: Return to Variks.
displayProperties.name: Europa Arms

3560528865.displaySource: "The spoils of Europa belong not in the claws of Darkness, but in the hands of justice. Bring your findings back to me." —Variks the Loyal

setData.questStepSummary: You've found a piece of Aged Armor. Variks may be able to identify it.

displayProperties.description: Look for a Stasis-sealed chest in Perdition.
displayProperties.name: Europa Class

908878819.displaySource: "Eramis has long coveted the technology left behind by Clovis Bray. But she does not deserve any of it. Find what she has hidden, and use Stasis to acquire it. For the cause." —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description: Return to Variks.
displayProperties.name: Europa Class

908878818.displaySource: "Europa is ripe for the picking. You are as deserved of its spoils as anyone else. Except Eramis. Bring your findings back to me." —Variks the Loyal

setData.questStepSummary: You've found a piece of Aged Armor. Variks may be able to identify it.

displayProperties.description: Look for Stasis-sealed chests in Riis-Reborn Approach and Technocrat's Iron.
displayProperties.name: Europa Chest

658526296.displaySource: "Eramis found much of what the Golden Age left behind here on Europa. She hid much of it away, but not carefully enough. If only she had the good sense to account for you. Find what she has hidden, and use Stasis to acquire it. For the cause." —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description: Return to Variks.
displayProperties.name: Europa Chest

658526297.displaySource: "The spoils of Europa are ours to take as much as anyone else. Bring your findings back to me." —Variks the Loyal

setData.questStepSummary: You've found a piece of Aged Armor. Variks may be able to identify it.

displayProperties.description: Look for Stasis-sealed chests in Nexus and Well of Infinitude.
displayProperties.name: Europa Helm

1666445095.displaySource: "Eramis puts on a facade of strength—but behind it, she is weak. She covets that which is not hers to have. She knows this, so she hides much of it away across Europa. Find what she has hidden, and use Stasis to acquire it. For the cause." —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description: Return to Variks.
displayProperties.name: Europa Helm

1666445094.displaySource: "Europa's treasures are ours to take. Bring your findings back to me." —Variks the Loyal

setData.questStepSummary: You've found a piece of Aged Armor. Variks may be able to identify it.

displayProperties.description: Complete "The New Kell" mission.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary: A new Fallen leader resides on Europa, building an empire out of Darkness. This new Kell, Eramis, must be stopped before she gets any stronger.

displayProperties.description: Return to Variks to discuss what to do about Eramis's growing power.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary: The power of Eramis and her followers is beyond your capabilities.

displayProperties.description: Complete the "Rising Resistance" mission.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary: With Eramis's undefeatable power of Stasis in the way, Variks asks for your help. Many fellow Eliksni desire to break out from the grips of House Salvation.

displayProperties.description: Speak to the Exo Stranger to learn why she's here and what the monolith is.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary: As you were going towards the Pyramid, a strange monolith has appeared in Beyond, along with a few old friends.

displayProperties.description: Attune the Splinter of Darkness in the Ziggurat in Beyond.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary:
The Exo Stranger has given you a Splinter of Darkness and pointed you towards the newly arrived Ziggurat. Go to it and begin your journey towards mastering Stasis.

Seals: [Stasis: Glyph 0] [Stasis: Glyph 1 Locked] [Stasis: Glyph 2 Locked] [Stasis: Glyph 3 Locked]

displayProperties.description: Commune with a Crux of Darkness in Nexus.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary:
The Splinter of Darkness pulses in attunement with the Ziggurat. The first lesson is that of acceptance. Be bold and open your mind and body to the possibilities of this new power.

Now that you've accepted this weighty responsibility, find your way to a Crux of Darkness. Commune with it. It will give you a taste of what lies ahead on this path. 

Seals: [Stasis: Glyph 0] [Stasis: Glyph 1 Locked] [Stasis: Glyph 2 Locked] [Stasis: Glyph 3 Locked]

displayProperties.description: Secure the nearby [Stasis: Glyph 0] locked chest in Nexus by breaking the Stasis Seal and opening the container.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary:
Your communion with the Crux of Darkness has allowed you to wield the power of Stasis for the first time. You've accepted its offering and now better understand the multi-functional properties of Stasis. Eramis has used that same understanding to fortify her Fallen barriers and valued items with Stasis-enforced Seals. You can now unlock the simplest of her Seals: [Stasis: Glyph 0]. Search the area. There's likely to be one nearby.

Seals: [Stasis: Glyph 0] [Stasis: Glyph 1 Locked] [Stasis: Glyph 2 Locked] [Stasis: Glyph 3 Locked]

displayProperties.description: Regroup with Variks in Charon's Crossing.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary:
The Stasis-sealed chest you unlocked contained an interesting piece of armor. Bring it to Variks so he can examine it for you.

Now that you understand how useful this power can be, you should keep an eye out for more Stasis Seals. By breaking them open, you can obtain valuable equipment and destabilize House Salvation even further.

It's time to demonstrate your newfound skills in a much more impactful way. The Exo Stranger mentioned the members of Eramis's dark council each hold their own Splinters of Darkness. Variks will know where to find them.

displayProperties.description: In a single life, defeat Fallen in Eventide Ruins.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

1438363708.displaySource: "These Eliksni are most loyal to Phylaks. You must cut through them if you wish to reach their leader." —Variks the Loyal

setData.questStepSummary: Phylaks was ordered to take control of Vex territory on Europa. By defeating her soldiers patrolling the outskirts of the Fallen city, you should be able to discover intel on her location.

displayProperties.description: Draw out and defeat Elenaks, Salvation Elite in Asterion Abyss.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

1013534599.displaySource: "Phylaks uses her soldiers like pieces on a game board. You must draw her out. Give her no choice." —Variks the Loyal

setData.questStepSummary:
Ghost picked up some intel from the Fallen troops you defeated. Phylaks has platoons patrolling Asterion Abyss, trying to claim Vex-held territory for Eramis.

Defeating these platoons will draw out Phylaks's commander, Elenaks. This should lead to more information about her whereabouts.

displayProperties.description: Complete "The Warrior" Empire Hunt.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

523748088.displaySource: "Eramis chose Phylaks for her strategy and her brutality. You will see for yourself." —Variks the Loyal

setData.questStepSummary:
You have finally caught the attention of Phylaks. She's transmitted her location and challenged you to a fight. It seems that she and her troops have reclaimed the Vex-held territory and are ready to confront you.

Defeat Phylaks, the Warrior.

displayProperties.description: Return to the Exo Stranger in Beyond.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary: You've defeated Phylaks and disrupted House Salvation's attempt to claim Vex territory. In return, you gained Phylaks's Splinter of Darkness. Bring it to the Exo Stranger. It may be useful in your journey towards mastering Stasis.

displayProperties.description: Attune your Splinter of Darkness with the next Stasis Seal in the Ziggurat in Beyond.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary:
The Exo Stranger enhanced your Splinter with the one you retrieved from Phylaks. Take it to the Ziggurat in order to continue down this path.

Seals: [Stasis: Glyph 0] [Stasis: Glyph 1 Locked] [Stasis: Glyph 2 Locked] [Stasis: Glyph 3 Locked]

displayProperties.description: Commune with the next Crux of Darkness in Bray Exoscience.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary:
The Splinter of Darkness pulses in attunement with the Ziggurat. The second lesson is that of resistance. Be mindful. Guard your emotions against the temptations of the Darkness as well as your own fear in wielding it. This will help you resist any attack on or off the battlefield. Put that into practice when you find the next Crux.

Seals: [Stasis: Glyph 0] [Stasis: Glyph 1 Locked] [Stasis: Glyph 2 Locked] [Stasis: Glyph 3 Locked]

displayProperties.description: Regroup with Variks in Charon's Crossing.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary: Now that you've resisted the temptations of the Darkness, it's time to test your sharpened Stasis skills on the next member of Eramis's dark council.

displayProperties.description: Collect tracking devices by defeating Vex in Asterion Abyss. Minotaurs will always drop the devices.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

1438363709.displaySource: "Praksis admires the Vex. He seeks to use them to improve Eliksni technology. Variks does not know how." —Variks the Loyal

setData.questStepSummary: Variks informs you that Praksis's latest experiment involves the Vex. He attached a tracking device to some of them. By retrieving those tracking devices, you should get a lead on his location.

displayProperties.description: In Cadmus Ridge, locate and shut down the Vex conflux created by Praksis.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

4224533134.displaySource: "Eliksni once made marvels to rival your Golden Age. When you fight them, you do not just fight scavengers… but inventors. Creators. Architects." —Variks the Loyal

setData.questStepSummary: Ghost is now able to locate Praksis's latest experiment. He has created an artificial Vex conflux to lure and trap the Vex. If you disrupt his experiment, Praksis might show himself.

displayProperties.description: Complete "The Technocrat" Empire Hunt.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

2943602311.displaySource: "His creations… they mean more to Praksis than anything. They are his legacy. He will not surrender them easily." —Variks the Loyal

setData.questStepSummary:
The Servitor you destroyed was in communication with Praksis, and Ghost is now able to identify his location. You must find and defeat him.

Defeat Praksis, the Technocrat.

displayProperties.description: Return to your camp in Beyond.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary: You retrieved a Splinter of Darkness after defeating another member of Eramis's dark council, Praksis. Bring it to the Exo Stranger to enhance your own Splinter and continue your journey in mastering Stasis.

displayProperties.description: Speak to Shaw Han in The Steppes.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary: According to Zavala, Eramis has left Europa to reconnect with the House of Devils on Earth. He sends you to Shaw Han, a Guardian patrolling the Cosmodrome, for more details on this new intel.

displayProperties.description: Defeat Fallen in the Cosmodrome, The Divide, to gather intel on the location of Bakris, the Adamantine.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary: According to Shaw Han, Eramis's sergeant Bakris is still in the Cosmodrome to ensure recruitment to the army of House Salvation. Shaw reports evidence of Stasis recently found in The Divide, not far from an old Devils hideout.

displayProperties.description: Eliminate Bakris, the Adamantine and scatter the Devils in the Exodus Garden 2A Lost Sector in The Divide.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary:
Shaw's suspicions are confirmed: the Devils have agreed to join Eramis's army on Europa. To make matters worse, they'll be bringing along a battalion of Walkers.

Fortunately, transporting this kind of weaponry is no simple task. At present, Eramis's sergeant Bakris convenes with the former Devils in their hideout in The Divide. There's still time to show them that even with Stasis, House Salvation is no match for the Guardians.

displayProperties.description: Complete "The Glassway" strike. Select it from the Europa map.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary:
Though her recruitment scheme has been thwarted, Eramis has another ace up her sleeve back on Europa.

Eramis plans on reactivating a long dormant Clovis Bray facility by powering up a Vex portal.

Stop her before she reactivates the portal and unleashes the Vex, endangering all life on Europa.

displayProperties.description: Return to the Exo Stranger in Beyond.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary:
By reactivating the Vex portal built by Clovis Bray, Eramis endangered all life on Europa, including her own soldiers' lives. Though you successfully thinned the Vex hordes, Eramis was still able to collect the radiolarian fluid she needed and escape. 

What she plans to do with this resource is not yet clear. What is clear is that the Darkness has fueled her anger into a reckless rage. She must be stopped once and for all. The time has come to complete your journey with Stasis.

displayProperties.description: Attune your Splinter of Darkness with the next Stasis Seal in the Ziggurat in Beyond.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary:
Your journey towards mastering Stasis continues. Attune your Splinter, now enhanced by the one you retrieved from Praksis, once more at the Ziggurat.

Seals: [Stasis: Glyph 0] [Stasis: Glyph 1 Locked] [Stasis: Glyph 2 Locked] [Stasis: Glyph 3 Locked]

displayProperties.description: Commune with the next Crux of Darkness in the Riis-Reborn Approach.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary:
The next lesson is that of control. In order to wield Stasis effectively, it must become an extension of your will.

Discipline your mind, and you'll make this dark power yours, instead of the other way around.

The next Crux is located in the heart of House Salvation's territory. The enemies you face there will attack with the rage of the affronted. Focus your abilities with firm resolve so that the battle plays out exactly as you see fit.

Seals: [Stasis: Glyph 0] [Stasis: Glyph 1 Locked] [Stasis: Glyph 2 Locked] [Stasis: Glyph 3 Locked]

displayProperties.description: Regroup with Variks in Charon's Crossing.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary: With your control of Stasis stronger than ever, you're finally ready to take on Eramis.

displayProperties.description: In Eventide Ruins, ensure that the fleeing allied Skiff escapes Europa.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

2683598861.displaySource: "Not all Eliksni wish to live this way. Many are weary of the fighting." —Variks the Loyal

setData.questStepSummary: It's time to eliminate Eramis, but first, Variks has asked for your help. His allies are planning to flee Europa to escape Eramis, and the Skiff set to evacuate is carrying an important Fallen asset. Sworn to secrecy by his allies, Variks will provide you no details, but he believes the "asset" will be crucial to the success of House Light on Earth. The Skiff must escape Europa safely.

displayProperties.description: Complete "The Kell of Darkness" mission.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

780325502.displaySource: "I believed in Eramiskel. In her ideas. But she has wandered so far from whom she once was." —Variks the Loyal

setData.questStepSummary:
Variks has been able to evacuate fleeing Eliksni off Europa, thanks to your help. The way is clear for you to go after Eramis and put an end to House Salvation's threat to the Traveler and the Last City.

Defeat Eramis, Kell of Darkness.

displayProperties.description: Return to the Exo Stranger in Beyond.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary:
You have discovered your Darkness within, and the threat posed by Eramis is no more. Her frozen visage will haunt the vista of Riis-Reborn for eternity.

The time has come for you to complete your journey and truly master the power of Stasis.

displayProperties.description: Attune your Splinter of Darkness with the final Stasis Seal in the Ziggurat in Beyond.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary:
You've nearly reached the end of your journey. Attune your Splinter at the Ziggurat for the final time.

Seals: [Stasis: Glyph 0] [Stasis: Glyph 1 Locked] [Stasis: Glyph 2 Locked] [Stasis: Glyph 3 Locked]

displayProperties.description:
Now, embrace the power of Darkness and close out this chapter of your journey.

Go beyond and fully realize the potential of Stasis.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary:
You stand now at the end of this path, having learned acceptance, resistance, and control. You have wielded Stasis with skill and to good end. You have ended the dangerous reign of the Kell of Darkness.

Seals: [Stasis: Glyph 0] [Stasis: Glyph 1 Locked] [Stasis: Glyph 2 Locked] [Stasis: Glyph 3 Locked]

displayProperties.description: Return to the Exo Stranger in Beyond and stand before her as an adept of Stasis.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary:
You have fully embraced the Darkness.

Stasis is now yours to wield whenever you desire.

displayProperties.description: Return to the Tower and discuss your successes on Europa with Zavala.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary: Zavala has requested your presence at the Tower to congratulate you on defeating Eramis and discuss your further usage of Stasis.

displayProperties.description: Complete the "Darkness's Doorstep" mission.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary: The Darkness beckons you to Europa. Will you answer its call?

displayProperties.description: Meet Variks inside of the Charon's Crossing comms station to learn about the Fallen on Europa and their use of Darkness.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary: Variks is safe from the attacking Fallen for now. It's time to get some answers.

displayProperties.description:
Subdue the plans of House Salvation by thinning their ranks and completing public events and patrols in the current Eclipsed Zone.

Powerful combatants and Heroic public events grant the most efficient progress.
displayProperties.name: A Hard Rain Falls

2242123839.displaySource: "I believe House Salvation to be using whatever is at their disposal to secure and obtain the debris falling from the sky. Find them where the debris rains, and stop them." —The Exo Stranger

setData.questStepSummary:
Debris rains down onto the surface from the atmosphere above, left over from the destruction of Clovis Bray's space station, the Morning Star, after Guardians prevented House Salvation's efforts to use the Deep Stone Crypt to build an army of Darkness.

House Salvation now covets what remains, attempting to salvage anything they can from the debris themselves by fortifying the debris-laden areas through the use of Darkness.

displayProperties.description: Report your success and findings to the Exo Stranger.
displayProperties.name: A Hard Rain Falls

2242123836.displaySource: "House Salvation wields power we must continue to reckon with. Darkness aids them at every turn, it seems. Return to me; we have much to discuss." —The Exo Stranger

setData.questStepSummary: You've done your part to subdue House Salvation's attempts to gather power amongst the falling wreckage of the Morning Star, and you've witnessed their usage of Darkness.

displayProperties.description: Find out what's siphoning power from within Bray Exoscience.
displayProperties.name: Old Secrets, New Challenges

1784552507.displaySource: "Though Eramis dug deep, she did not uncover every secret buried within the ice. Long before our arrival, Europa thrived through scientific discovery during your Golden Age. It is, of course, the birthplace of the Exo. Though we understand little of what that actually entails. Perhaps you may be our key to unearthing these secrets and keeping them out of the hands of House Salvation."  —Variks the Loyal

setData.questStepSummary: The Guardians that stormed the Deep Stone Crypt inadvertently reactivated dormant power sources across Europa. Variks has detected one such power source within Bray Exoscience.

displayProperties.description: Return to the Exo Stranger in Charon's Crossing.
displayProperties.name: Old Secrets, New Challenges

1784552506.displaySource: "It seems you've discovered my grandfather's Exo training protocols. They were designed to hastily upgrade the physical and mental fortitude of newly built Exos. But their design contained a rather 'dark' secret, as did most things built by my grandfather. Be careful within them; I imagine they won't play nice." —The Exo Stranger

setData.questStepSummary: You've discovered what was siphoning power from Bray Exoscience. The Exo Stranger might be interested to hear what you've learned.

displayProperties.description: Locate and scan 3 dead Exos on Europa.
displayProperties.name: Lost Lament

1399678798.displaySource: "Lookin' like some of those flashes are of me trudging through ice and snow, passin' bodies of my fellow Exos. One of 'em looked to be surrounded by Vex technology, another amongst the ruins of an old city, and another surrounded by factory equipment. The rest are a blur… Shame I left 'em behind. Wish I knew why. Bet you might figure that out." —Banshee-44

setData.questLineDescription: Work with Banshee to unravel the mysteries surrounding a Golden Age blade.

displayProperties.description: Locate the Giant Exo hidden in the Exo facility.
displayProperties.name: Lost Lament

25511490.displaySource: "Those Dead Exos you found are giving me a headache something fierce—and even more flashes. That blade again, in more glory than before. Must be important. Also saw frozen-over labs filled with dormant Exos. Even saw one the size of a giant. Gonna take a guess and say that's your next stop… wherever it is." —Banshee-44

setData.questLineDescription: Work with Banshee to unravel the mysteries surrounding a Golden Age blade.

displayProperties.description: Prove yourself to the Clovis AI by using Swords against the Vex across Europa.
displayProperties.name: Lost Lament

4107530250.displaySource: "You really want to help your friend, Banshee? Start by eliminating any Vex you can find. They've long been more than just a pain in my side. One day, they will answer to us. Until then, see that they're dealt with." —Clovis AI

setData.questLineDescription: Work with Banshee to unravel the mysteries surrounding a Golden Age blade.

displayProperties.description: Acquire and complete the listed quests from Commander Zavala and Variks to prove yourself to the Clovis AI and continue on with "Lost Lament."
displayProperties.name: Lost Lament

465838244.displaySource: "I know you desire the blade. But you can't have it just yet. I'll need a few tasks completed first. It's been a while since I've been… awake. And now this alien race you call "Fallen" infest MY colony. They must be dealt with in short order. See to it." —Clovis AI

setData.questLineDescription: Work with Banshee to unravel the mysteries surrounding a Golden Age blade.

displayProperties.description: Prove your worth to the Clovis AI by completing an Exo Challenge.
displayProperties.name: Lost Lament

3938019989.displaySource: "Uh uh. Not quite yet. The blade is only for those who can handle its power. Sure, you've proven yourself somewhat. But I'll need to see you survive one of the training modules built for Exos first. Best of luck." —Clovis AI

setData.questLineDescription: Work with Banshee to unravel the mysteries surrounding a Golden Age blade.

displayProperties.description: Defeat Vex with finishers to satisfy the Clovis AI. Defeating powerful Vex grants the most efficient progress.
displayProperties.name: Lost Lament

3535843838.displaySource: "Last thing. I swear. There's still a number of Vex running around. Some too dangerous to leave unattended. Escort them out of this life, and I'll give you what you're after." —Clovis AI

setData.questLineDescription: Work with Banshee to unravel the mysteries surrounding a Golden Age blade.

displayProperties.description: Access the strike "The Glassway" and locate the blade pieces within.
displayProperties.name: Lost Lament

2423789933.displaySource: "Well then, perhaps I owe you the other side of quid pro quo. The blade you're looking for was broken into pieces somewhere in the Glassway. By now, the Vex have likely found it themselves. Someone as capable as you should have no issue retrieving it from them. Now leave me be." —Clovis AI

setData.questLineDescription: Work with Banshee to unravel the mysteries surrounding a Golden Age blade.

displayProperties.description: Head back to the Tower and speak to Banshee-44 about the broken blade.
displayProperties.name: Lost Lament

3263361561.displaySource: "Oh, did I forget to mention it was broken? Not my problem. Perhaps this Banshee friend of yours can help. Until next time." —Clovis AI

setData.questLineDescription: Work with Banshee to unravel the mysteries surrounding a Golden Age blade.

displayProperties.description: Search Eventide Ruins for an abandoned bunker and explore inside.
displayProperties.name: Lost Lament

3357553626.displaySource: "Not sure what exactly we're looking for in that bunker. But my instinct tells me it's some way to mend that Broken Blade. Look for a bunker hidden beneath the ice. That's the best I got for ya." —Banshee-44

setData.questLineDescription: Work with Banshee to unravel the mysteries surrounding a Golden Age blade.

displayProperties.description: Complete the mission "Reforging the Past" to save the Clovis AI from being destroyed.
displayProperties.name: Lost Lament

4257510940.displaySource: "This isn't the first time the Vex have tried to destroy me and everything I've built. I hate to admit it, but I need your help, and I need it immediately." —Clovis AI

setData.questLineDescription: Work with Banshee to unravel the mysteries surrounding a Golden Age blade.

displayProperties.description: Head back to the Tower and report your discoveries to Banshee-44.
displayProperties.name: Lost Lament

2711270400.displaySource: "Seems like we have a lot to discuss. The visions haven't stopped, but I think I get it now. You know where to find me." —Banshee-44

setData.questLineDescription: Work with Banshee to unravel the mysteries surrounding a Golden Age blade.

displayProperties.description: Defeat Fallen Captains and Servitors on Europa to collect intel.
displayProperties.name: The Stasis Prototype

3136133748.displaySource: "I've picked up a few Fallen weapons in my time. Pretty impressive what they can do with some spare parts and grit." —The Drifter

setData.questLineDescription: Team up with the Drifter to steal a Stasis weapon made by the Fallen.
setData.questStepSummary: The Drifter has asked you to gather Fallen weapons intel while he inspects the blueprints you found. That might lead to more information about the Stasis weapon prototype.

displayProperties.description:
Defeat one of Eramis's council members in an Empire Hunt.

Requires completion of the "Reclaiming Europa", "Empire's Fall" and "The Dark Priestess" quests.
Visit Variks in Charon's crossing to purchase Empire Hunts quests.
displayProperties.name: The Stasis Prototype

3459548846.displaySource: "Looks like there are some cracks in the empire now that Eramis is out. We can use that." —The Drifter

setData.questLineDescription: Team up with the Drifter to steal a Stasis weapon made by the Fallen.
setData.questStepSummary: You found some briefs that indicate the Stasis weapon effort is being led by a high-ranking Fallen lieutenant. Taking the lieutenant down could gain you more information about the gun's whereabouts.

displayProperties.description: Eliminate combatants with, or affected by, your Stasis abilities.
displayProperties.name: The Stasis Prototype

3257985301.displaySource: "Spider's got eyes all over this system. What do you wanna bet he has an inside man on Europa?" —The Drifter

setData.questLineDescription: Team up with the Drifter to steal a Stasis weapon made by the Fallen.
setData.questStepSummary: You discovered intel that suggests the Stasis weapon is being held in the Fallen city. Drifter's going to find you a way in. In the meantime, practicing with Stasis will be good preparation for learning to use this experimental gun.

displayProperties.description: Rendezvous with Spider's associate in the Concealed Void Lost Sector.
displayProperties.name: The Stasis Prototype

1388623635.displaySource: "Got a friend waiting for you in a Lost Sector. Might have to fight your way in first." —The Drifter

setData.questLineDescription: Team up with the Drifter to steal a Stasis weapon made by the Fallen.
setData.questStepSummary: Drifter contacts you to let you know Spider's sending an associate to meet with you. She has some tech that will disguise your ship to appear on radar as a Skiff, letting you sneak into a back area of the city. She's waiting for you in a Lost Sector.

displayProperties.description: Visit the Drifter in the Annex.
displayProperties.name: The Stasis Prototype

3184764590.displaySource: "I got one more piece of the puzzle to give you. Then we're ready to pull this thing off." —The Drifter

setData.questLineDescription: Team up with the Drifter to steal a Stasis weapon made by the Fallen.
setData.questStepSummary: With your new Skiff codes in hand, you're nearly ready to go after the Stasis weapon. First, Drifter wants to meet with you to give you a critical weapon component.

displayProperties.description: Complete the "Stealing Stasis" mission.
displayProperties.name: The Stasis Prototype

1299795970.displaySource: "I've got some… business to take care of. But I'll send your Ghost some notes on the area. How to get in and out real quick, no trouble." —The Drifter

setData.questLineDescription: Team up with the Drifter to steal a Stasis weapon made by the Fallen.
setData.questStepSummary: You're ready to go after the Stasis weapon prototype. You've got all the tools you need to break in. All that's left to do is get the gun.

displayProperties.description: Visit Drifter in the Annex.
displayProperties.name: The Stasis Prototype

3599609918.displaySource: "Let's see what the Fallen managed to cook up." —The Drifter

setData.questLineDescription: Team up with the Drifter to steal a Stasis weapon made by the Fallen.
setData.questStepSummary: You successfully acquired the Stasis weapon from the Fallen. Drifter wants to take a look at it.

displayProperties.description: Defeat combatants in the BrayTech facility.
displayProperties.name: Soon

2510021890.displaySource: "The mass driver's design is highly scalable. Were they able to compile the data and understand the design, House Salvation could use it to build weapon systems capable of firing across galaxies. This isn't just about refining a gun; it's about preventing a catastrophe." ⁠—The Exo Stranger

setData.questLineDescription: Retrieve the schematics for a prototype BrayTech mass driver weapon on Europa to fashion the catalyst for No Time to Explain.
setData.questStepSummary: To make adjustments to the weapon, the Exo Stranger needs you to track down the old schematics within the BrayTech facility.

displayProperties.description: Return to the Exo Stranger.
displayProperties.name: Soon

2510021889.displaySource: "My analysis of these schematics indicates that this mass driver integrated Vex technology, but I can only understand a fragment of what I'm looking at. But it… it looks like this weapon could skip its rounds forward in time." ⁠—Ghost

setData.questLineDescription: Retrieve the schematics for a prototype BrayTech mass driver weapon on Europa to fashion the catalyst for No Time to Explain.
setData.questStepSummary: You've recovered the weapon schematics. You should bring them to the Exo Stranger so she can analyze them.

displayProperties.description: Defeat Vex with No Time to Explain in Nexus, Infinitude, and The Glassway on Europa.
displayProperties.name: Soon

2510021888.displaySource: "I've been thinking about what these schematics imply: a mass driver capable of firing rounds greater than relativistic speeds? This wasn't meant to fight something on Europa, so… what was Clovis planning to aim it at?" ⁠—Ghost

setData.questLineDescription: Retrieve the schematics for a prototype BrayTech mass driver weapon on Europa to fashion the catalyst for No Time to Explain.
setData.questStepSummary: The Exo Stranger needs your help calibrating the weapon so that she can alter it. The best way to get the data she needs is by defeating Vex.

displayProperties.description: Return to the Exo Stranger.
displayProperties.name: Soon

2510021895.displaySource: "Part of me wonders if we're the first people—in this timeline—to ever manufacture something based on these schematics. What kind of catastrophe could a weapon of this nature have caused during the Collapse? Was it used against the Darkness? Or has it sat here all this time, unrealized?" —Ghost

setData.questLineDescription: Retrieve the schematics for a prototype BrayTech mass driver weapon on Europa to fashion the catalyst for No Time to Explain.
setData.questStepSummary: You've collected the required calibration data. The Exo Stranger will be able to use this to alter the weapon for you.

displayProperties.description: Collect tracking devices by defeating Vex in Asterion Abyss. Minotaurs will always drop the devices.
displayProperties.name: The Technocrat

1730090752.displaySource: "Praksis admires the Vex. He seeks to use them to improve Eliksni technology. Variks does not know how." —Variks the Loyal

setData.questStepSummary: Variks informs you that Praksis's latest experiment involves the Vex. He attached a tracking device to some of them. By retrieving those tracking devices, you should get a lead on his location.

displayProperties.description: In Cadmus Ridge, locate and shut down the Vex conflux created by Praksis.
displayProperties.name: The Technocrat

1730090753.displaySource: "Eliksni once made marvels to rival your Golden Age. When you fight them, you do not just fight scavengers… but inventors. Creators. Architects." —Variks the Loyal

setData.questStepSummary: Ghost is now able to locate Praksis's latest experiment. He has created an artificial Vex conflux to lure and trap the Vex. If you disrupt his experiment, Praksis might show himself.

displayProperties.description: Complete "The Technocrat" Empire Hunt.
displayProperties.name: The Technocrat

1730090754.displaySource: "His creations… they mean more to Praksis than anything. They are his legacy. He will not surrender them easily." —Variks the Loyal

setData.questStepSummary:
The Servitor you destroyed was in communication with Praksis, and Ghost is now able to identify his location. You must find and defeat him.

Defeat Praksis, the Technocrat.

displayProperties.description: Visit Variks in Charon's Crossing.
displayProperties.name: The Technocrat

1730090755.displaySource: "You make more than a dent in House Salvation with your actions. Praksis learned this the hard way." —Variks the Loyal

setData.questStepSummary: You've defeated Praksis, the Technocrat. You should tell Variks about your victory.

displayProperties.description: In a single life, defeat Fallen in Eventide Ruins.
displayProperties.name: The Warrior

1672479017.displaySource: "These Eliksni are most loyal to Phylaks. You must cut through them if you wish to reach their leader." —Variks the Loyal

setData.questStepSummary: Phylaks was ordered to take control of Vex territory on Europa. By defeating her soldiers patrolling the outskirts of the Fallen city, you should be able to discover intel on her location.

displayProperties.description: Draw out and defeat Elenaks, Salvation Elite in Asterion Abyss.
displayProperties.name: The Warrior

1672479016.displaySource: "Phylaks uses her soldiers like pieces on a game board. You must draw her out. Give her no choice." —Variks the Loyal

setData.questStepSummary:
Ghost picked up some intel from the Fallen troops you defeated. Phylaks has platoons patrolling Asterion Abyss, trying to claim Vex-held territory for Eramis.

Defeating these platoons will draw out Phylaks's commander, Elenaks. This should lead to more information about her whereabouts.

displayProperties.description: Complete "The Warrior" Empire Hunt.
displayProperties.name: The Warrior

1672479019.displaySource: "Eramis chose Phylaks for her strategy and her brutality. You will see for yourself." —Variks the Loyal

setData.questStepSummary:
You have finally caught the attention of Phylaks. She's transmitted her location and challenged you to a fight. It seems that she and her troops have reclaimed the Vex-held territory and are ready to confront you.

Defeat Phylaks, the Warrior.

displayProperties.description: Visit Variks in Charon's Crossing.
displayProperties.name: The Warrior

1672479018.displaySource: "I… should not have doubted you. If you can best Phylaks, perhaps there is hope." —Variks the Loyal
